column2: caption=Linda Proudfoot from [[The Hobbit (2003 video game)

column1: Linda was the fourth child of [[Mungo Baggins]] and [[Laura Grubb]]. She married [[Bodo Proudfoot]] and was the mother of [[Odo Proudfoot
:Five portraits are clustered on a wall in [[Bag End]]. One of them is Linda, and one of Bilbo's lines when looking at the portraits is "That's my aunt Linda when she was a child".
